privacy.privacy-content_p1: This privacy policy ("Policy") outlines how Taoist Labs ("Company," "we," "our," or "us") collects, utilizes, shares, and stores the personal information of users visiting our websites, https://reiwallet.io/ (referred to as the "Sites"). The Policy is applicable to the Services provided on or through the Sites, including applications, products, and related services.
privacy.privacy-content_p2: By using the Services, you acknowledge and accept the terms of this Policy, along with our Terms of Use. You also provide consent for us to collect, use, disclose, and retain your information as described in this Policy. If you haven't done so already, we encourage you to review our terms of use, as they contain provisions that limit our liability and require the resolution of any disputes on an individual basis rather than through class or representative actions. If you disagree with any part of this Privacy Policy or our Terms of Use, we kindly request that you refrain from using any of the Services.
privacy.privacy-content_p3: We retain the information we collect for as long as necessary and relevant to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy policy. Additionally, we retain personal information to comply with applicable laws, prevent fraud, resolve disputes, troubleshoot issues, assist with investigations, enforce our Terms of Use, and undertake other actions permitted by law. When determining the appropriate retention period for personal information, we consider factors such as the amount, nature, and sensitivity of the information, the potential risks associated with unauthorized use or disclosure, the purposes for processing the information, alternative means to achieve those purposes, and the applicable legal requirements.
privacy.privacy-content_p4: Under certain circumstances, we may anonymize your personal information, rendering it unassociated with you. In such cases, we may use this anonymized information indefinitely without providing further notice to you.
privacy.privacy-content_p5: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect the security of all information submitted through the Services. However, please note that the security of information transmitted over the internet can never be guaranteed. We cannot be held responsible for any interception, interruption, changes, or loss of data during internet communications. Users of the Services are responsible for maintaining the security of any passwords, biometrics, user IDs, or other authentication methods required for accessing password-protected or secure areas of our digital services. To ensure your safety and protect your data, we may temporarily suspend your use of the Services without notice if we suspect any security breaches.

mnemonics.mnemonicTips: If you ever change browsers or move computers, you will need this Secret Recovery Phrase to access your accounts. Save them somewhere safe and secret.

DO NOT share this phrase with anyone!
These words can be used to steal all your accounts.
